verses.verse: וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלִישָׁ֑ע <S%H477><s%> Elisha הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> Behold now the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> where we dwell שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> unto צַ֥ר <S%H6862><s%> with thee is too strait מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> is too

נֵֽלְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> go נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> we pray thee unto Jordan וְנִקְחָ֤ה <S%H3947><s%> and take מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thence every man קוֹרָ֣ה <S%H6982><s%> beam אֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> a וְנַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and let us make לָּ֥נוּ שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> us a place לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> there where we may dwell שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> where וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered לֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> Go

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> And one ה֥וֹאֶל <S%H2974><s%> Be content נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> Please וְלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> to go אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> with thy servants וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> shall go

וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אִתָּ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> with them And when they came הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <S%H3383><s%> to Jordan וַֽיִּגְזְר֖וּ <S%H1504><s%> they cut down הָעֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> wood

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> But as one מַפִּ֣יל <S%H5307><s%> was felling הַקּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H6982><s%> a beam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> the axe head נָפַ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> fell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> into the water וַיִּצְעַ֥ק <S%H6817><s%> and he cried וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲהָ֥הּ <S%H162><s%> Alas אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> master וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> it was שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7592><s%> for it was borrowed

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> And the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God אָ֣נָה <S%H575><s%> Where נָפָ֑ל <S%H5307><s%> fell וַיַּרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> it? And he shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> him the place וַיִּקְצָב־ <S%H7094><s%> And he cut down עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> a stick וַיַּשְׁלֶךְ־ <S%H7993><s%> and cast שָׁ֔מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וַיָּ֖צֶף <S%H6687><s%> did swim הַבַּרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> [it] in thither and the iron

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Therefore said הָ֣רֶם <S%H7311><s%> he Take [it] up לָ֑ךְ וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> to thee And he put out יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיִּקָּחֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> and took פ

וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become נִלְחָ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> warred בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיִּוָּעַץ֙ <S%H3289><s%> and took counsel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> his עֲבָדָ֣יו <S%H5650><s%> with his servants לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מְק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> a place פְּלֹנִ֥י <S%H6423><s%> In such אַלְמֹנִ֖י <S%H492><s%> and such תַּחֲנֹתִֽי׃ <S%H8466><s%> [shall be] my camp

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִשָּׁ֕מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Beware מֵעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> that thou pass הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> a place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> not such כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֲרָ֥ם <S%H758><s%> for thither the Syrians נְחִתִּֽים׃ <S%H5181><s%> be broken

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> sent מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> to the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> told ל֧וֹ אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> which the man הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God [וְהִזְהִירָהּ כ] (וְהִזְהִירֹ֖ו <S%H2094><s%> admonish ק) וְנִשְׁמַ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> him of and saved שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> himself there not once וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or שְׁתָּֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> nor twice

וַיִּסָּעֵר֙ <S%H5590><s%> was sore troubled לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> Therefore the heart מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> for this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and he called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> his servants וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about הֲלוֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> not תַּגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> unto them Will ye not shew לִ֔י מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> which מִשֶּׁלָּ֖נוּ <S%H7945><s%> cause אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> me which of us [is] for the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> And one מֵֽעֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants ל֖וֹא <S%H3808><s%> No אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> None my lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> but אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <S%H477><s%> but Elisha הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> that [is] in Israel יַגִּיד֙ <S%H5046><s%> telleth לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֨דְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who תְּדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> that thou speakest בַּחֲדַ֥ר <S%H2315><s%> chamber מִשְׁכָּבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4904><s%> bed

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go וּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> and spy אֵיכֹ֣ה <S%H351><s%> where ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> I וְאֶשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> he [is] that I may send וְאֶקָּחֵ֑הוּ <S%H3947><s%> and fetch וַיֻּגַּד־ <S%H5046><s%> him And it was told ל֥וֹ לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> him saying הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בְדֹתָֽן׃ <S%H1886><s%> Behold [he is] in Dothan

וַיִּשְׁלַח־ <S%H7971><s%> Therefore sent שָׁ֛מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> he thither horses וְרֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and chariots וְחַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> host כָּבֵ֑ד <S%H3515><s%> and a great וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וַיַּקִּ֖פוּ <S%H5362><s%> about עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

וַ֠יַּשְׁכֵּם <S%H7925><s%> early מְשָׁרֵ֨ת <S%H8334><s%> And when the servant אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> of God לָקוּם֒ <S%H6965><s%> was risen וַיֵּצֵ֕א <S%H3318><s%> and gone forth וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold חַ֛יִל <S%H2428><s%> behold an host סוֹבֵ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וְס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> both with horses וָרָ֑כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and chariots וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נַעֲר֥וֹ <S%H5288><s%> And his servant אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> to him אֲהָ֥הּ <S%H162><s%> unto him Alas אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> my master אֵיכָ֥ה <S%H349><s%> shall we נַֽעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> how shall we do

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> Fear כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> not for they that [be] with us [are] more אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתָּ֔נוּ <S%H854><s%> for מֵאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed אֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> And Elisha וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD פְּקַח־ <S%H6491><s%> I pray thee open נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> pray אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וְיִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> that he may see וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <S%H6491><s%> opened יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> of the young man וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> and he saw וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הָהָ֜ר <S%H2022><s%> and behold the mountain מָלֵ֨א <S%H4390><s%> [was] full סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> of horses וְרֶ֛כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and chariots אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire סְבִיבֹ֥ת <S%H5439><s%> round about אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <S%H477><s%> Elisha

וַיֵּרְדוּ֮ <S%H3381><s%> And when they came down אֵלָיו֒ <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <S%H477><s%> to him Elisha אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said הַךְ־ <S%H5221><s%> Smite נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> pray אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹי־ <S%H1471><s%> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֑ים <S%H5575><s%> I pray thee with blindness וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> And he smote בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֖ים <S%H5575><s%> them with blindness כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <S%H477><s%> of Elisha

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> then אֱלִישָׁ֗ע <S%H477><s%> And Elisha לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדֶּרֶךְ֮ <S%H1870><s%> unto them This [is] not the way וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor זֹ֣ה <S%H2090><s%> neither [is] this הָעִיר֒ <S%H5892><s%> the city לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> will bring אַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> And וְאוֹלִ֣יכָה <S%H1980><s%> brought אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> you to the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom תְּבַקֵּשׁ֑וּן <S%H1245><s%> whom ye seek וַיֹּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> will bring אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> שֹׁמְרֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H8111><s%> them to Samaria

וַיְהִי֮ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּבֹאָ֣ם <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass when they were come שֹׁמְרוֹן֒ <S%H8111><s%> into Samaria וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> that Elisha יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD פְּקַ֥ח <S%H6491><s%> open אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֵֽי־ <S%H5869><s%> the eyes אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וְיִרְא֑וּ <S%H7200><s%> of these [men] that they may see וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <S%H6491><s%> opened יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes וַיִּרְא֕וּ <S%H7200><s%> and they saw וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> and behold [they were] in the midst שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> unto Elisha כִּרְאֹת֖וֹ <S%H7200><s%> when he saw אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> הַאַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> shall I smite אַכֶּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> [them]? shall I smite אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> them My father

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he answered לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַכֶּ֔ה <S%H5221><s%> Thou shalt not smite הַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> those שָׁבִ֛יתָ <S%H7617><s%> those whom thou hast taken captive בְּחַרְבְּךָ֥ <S%H2719><s%> with thy sword וּֽבְקַשְׁתְּךָ֖ <S%H7198><s%> arch אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מַכֶּ֑ה <S%H5221><s%> [them] wouldest thou smite שִׂים֩ <S%H7760><s%> appoint לֶ֨חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וָמַ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> and water לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> before וְיֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> them that they may eat וְיִשְׁתּ֔וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink וְיֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H113><s%> to their master

וַיִּכְרֶ֨ה <S%H3739><s%> And he prepared לָהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> like כֵּרָ֣ה <S%H3740><s%> provision גְדוֹלָ֗ה <S%H1419><s%> great וַיֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> for them and when they had eaten וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drunk וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <S%H7971><s%> he sent them away וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H113><s%> to their master וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָ֤סְפוּ <S%H3254><s%> no more עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again גְּדוּדֵ֣י <S%H1416><s%> So the bands אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> came בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> this וַיִּקְבֹּ֛ץ <S%H6908><s%> gathered בֶּן־ הֲדַ֥ד <S%H1130><s%> that Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <S%H4264><s%> all his host וַיַּ֕עַל <S%H5927><s%> and went up וַיָּ֖צַר <S%H6696><s%> and besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> Samaria

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> was sold רָעָ֤ב <S%H7458><s%> famine גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> And there was a great בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold צָרִ֣ים <S%H6696><s%> and behold they besieged עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until הֱי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> was sold רֹאשׁ־ <S%H7218><s%> head חֲמוֹר֙ <S%H2543><s%> it until an ass's בִּשְׁמֹנִ֣ים <S%H8084><s%> was [sold] for fourscore כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver וְרֹ֛בַע <S%H7255><s%> and the fourth part הַקַּ֥ב <S%H6894><s%> of a cab [חֲרֵייֹונִים כ] (דִּבְיֹונִ֖ים <S%H2755><s%> doves' dung ק) בַּחֲמִשָּׁה־ <S%H2568><s%> for five כָֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And as the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֹבֵ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> was passing by עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> a woman צָעֲקָ֤ה <S%H6817><s%> there cried אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <S%H3467><s%> Help אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> O king

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יוֹשִׁעֵ֣ךְ <S%H3467><s%> do not help יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> If the LORD מֵאַ֖יִן <S%H370><s%> thee whence אֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֑ךְ <S%H3467><s%> shall I help הֲמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From הַגֹּ֖רֶן <S%H1637><s%> thee? out of the barnfloor א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיָּֽקֶב׃ <S%H3342><s%> the wine

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said לָ֥הּ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to her What לָּ֑ךְ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto her What aileth thee? And she answered הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> This woman הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אָמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me תְּנִ֤י <S%H5414><s%> unto me Give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵךְ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy son וְנֹאכְלֶ֣נּוּ <S%H398><s%> that we may eat הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> him to day וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> my son נֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> and we will eat מָחָֽר׃ <S%H4279><s%> to morrow

וַנְּבַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H1310><s%> So we boiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> my son וַנֹּֽאכְלֵ֑הוּ <S%H398><s%> and did eat וָאֹמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> him and I said אֵלֶ֜יהָ <S%H413><s%> about בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָאַחֵ֗ר <S%H312><s%> unto her on the next תְּנִ֤י <S%H5414><s%> Give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵךְ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy son וְנֹ֣אכְלֶ֔נּוּ <S%H398><s%> that we may eat וַתַּחְבִּ֖א <S%H2244><s%> him and she hath hid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1121><s%> her son

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> the words הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> of the woman וַיִּקְרַ֣ע <S%H7167><s%> that he rent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> and he passed by עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> looked הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַשַּׂ֛ק <S%H8242><s%> and behold [he had] sackcloth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> upon his flesh מִבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> within

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> do לִּ֥י אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> also יוֹסִ֑ף <S%H3254><s%> so and more אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> if יַעֲמֹ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> shall stand רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> also to me if the head אֱלִישָׁ֧ע <S%H477><s%> of Elisha בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֛ט <S%H8202><s%> of Shaphat עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> on הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> on him this day

וֶאֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> But Elisha יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> sat בְּבֵית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house וְהַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> and the elders יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> sat אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> and וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> with him and [the king] sent אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man מִלְּפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> from before בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יָבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> came הַמַּלְאָ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> him but ere the messenger אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about וְה֣וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> he אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> to him he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> to the elders הַרְּאִיתֶם֙ <S%H7200><s%> See כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how שָׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> hath sent בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ye how this son הַֽמְרַצֵּ֤חַ <S%H7523><s%> of a murderer הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this לְהָסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> to take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשִׁ֔י <S%H7218><s%> band רְא֣וּ ׀ <S%H7200><s%> see כְּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> cometh הַמַּלְאָ֗ךְ <S%H4397><s%> when the messenger סִגְר֤וּ <S%H5462><s%> shut הַדֶּ֙לֶת֙ <S%H1817><s%> the door וּלְחַצְתֶּ֤ם <S%H3905><s%> and hold him fast אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּדֶּ֔לֶת <S%H1817><s%> at the door הֲל֗וֹא <S%H3808><s%> is not ק֛וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [is] not the sound רַגְלֵ֥י <S%H7272><s%> feet אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> of his master's אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> behind

עוֹדֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H5750><s%> was still מְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And while he yet talked עִמָּ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> them וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> with them behold the messenger יֹרֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> came down אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and he said הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> this הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> Behold this evil מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] of the LORD מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> why אוֹחִ֥יל <S%H3176><s%> what should I wait לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> any ס
